# Happiness and life satisfaction:

Data source: [Happiness data](https://ourworldindata.org/happiness-and-life-satisfaction)

The Eurobarometer collects data on life satisfaction as part of their public opinion surveys. For several countries, these surveys have been conducted at least annually for more than 40 years.
